amendment.description: Page 62, after line 2, insert the following new section: SEC. 609. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used for the Advanced Research Projects Agency--Energy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of of funds to be used for the Advanced Research Projects Agency - Energy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 341 (Roll no. 587).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 81 - 341 (Roll no. 587).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Flake.
